languages.text: Whenever an enemy is killed by a {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hit{/g} scored by the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerHunterGlossary}Bounty Hunter{/g} or their ally, the Bounty Hunter gains +<u>(2 × enemy's {g|Encyclopedia:DifficultyTier}difficulty tier{/g})</u>% {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} for 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g}.
languages.original_text: Когда цель погибает, получив {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}критическое попадание{/g} от {g|Encyclopedia:CareerHunterGlossary}охотника за головами{/g} или его союзника, охотник получает +<u>(2 × {g|Encyclopedia:DifficultyTier}ранг{/g} цели)</u>% к {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урону{/g} на 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}раунда{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Whenever an enemy is killed by a critical hit scored by the Hunter or their ally, the Hunter gains +<u>4×(enemy's difficulty tier)%</u> damage for 2 rounds.
Whenever an enemy is killed by a critical hit scored by the Hunter or their ally, the Hunter gains +<u>(4 × enemy's difficulty tier)</u>% damage for 2 rounds.

languages.text: Когда цель погибает, получив {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}критическое попадание{/g} от {g|Encyclopedia:CareerHunterGlossary}охотника за головами{/g} или его союзника, охотник получает +<u>(2 × {g|Encyclopedia:DifficultyTier}ранг{/g} цели)</u>% к {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урону{/g} на 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}раунда{/g}.
languages.original_text: Whenever an enemy is killed by a {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hit{/g} scored by the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerHunterGlossary}Bounty Hunter{/g} or their ally, the Bounty Hunter gains +<u>(2 × enemy's {g|Encyclopedia:DifficultyTier}difficulty tier{/g})</u>% {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} for 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Когда цель погибает, получив критическое попадание от охотника или его союзника, охотник получает +<u>(4 × уровень сложности противника)</u>% к урону на 2 раунда.
Когда цель погибает, получив критическое попадание от охотника или его союзника, охотник получает +<u>(4 × уровень сложности противника)</u>% к урону на 2 раунда.

languages.text: 每当{g|Encyclopedia:CareerHunterGlossary}赏金猎人{/g}或盟友通过{g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}暴击{/g}击杀敌人时，赏金猎人造成的{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}都会提高<u>（2×敌人的{g|Encyclopedia:DifficultyTier}难度等级{/g}）</u>%，持续两{g|Encyclopedia:Round}轮{/g}。
languages.original_text: Whenever an enemy is killed by a {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hit{/g} scored by the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerHunterGlossary}Bounty Hunter{/g} or their ally, the Bounty Hunter gains +<u>(2 × enemy's {g|Encyclopedia:DifficultyTier}difficulty tier{/g})</u>% {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} for 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g}.

traits.locale_text: 每当猎人或盟友通过{g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}暴击{/g}击杀敌人时，猎人造成的伤害都会提高<u>（4×敌人的{g|Encyclopedia:DifficultyTier}难度等级{/g}）</u>%，持续两{g|Encyclopedia:Round}轮{/g}。

languages.text: Cada vez que el {g|Encyclopedia:CareerHunterGlossary}cazarrecompensas{/g} o su aliado matan a un enemigo con un {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}impacto crítico{/g}, el cazarrecompensas gana un +<u>(2 × {g|Encyclopedia:DifficultyTier}nivel de desafío{/g} del enemigo)</u> % al {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}daño{/g} durante 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}asaltos{/g}.
languages.original_text: Whenever an enemy is killed by a {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hit{/g} scored by the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerHunterGlossary}Bounty Hunter{/g} or their ally, the Bounty Hunter gains +<u>(2 × enemy's {g|Encyclopedia:DifficultyTier}difficulty tier{/g})</u>% {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} for 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Cada vez que el {g|Encyclopedia:CareerHunterGlossary}cazarrecompensas{/g} o su aliado matan a un enemigo con un {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}impacto crítico{/g}, el cazarrecompensas gana un +<u>(2 × {g|Encyclopedia:DifficultyTier}nivel de desafío{/g} del enemigo)</u> % al {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}daño{/g} durante 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}asaltos{/g}.

languages.text: Immer wenn ein Feind durch einen {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}kritischen Treffer{/g} des {g|Encyclopedia:CareerHunterGlossary}Kopfgeldjägers{/g} oder seines Verbündeten getötet wird, erhält der Kopfgeldjäger für 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}Runden{/g} +<u>(2 × {g|Encyclopedia:DifficultyTier}Schwierigkeitsstufe{/g} des Feindes)</u> % {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Schaden{/g}.
languages.original_text: Whenever an enemy is killed by a {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hit{/g} scored by the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerHunterGlossary}Bounty Hunter{/g} or their ally, the Bounty Hunter gains +<u>(2 × enemy's {g|Encyclopedia:DifficultyTier}difficulty tier{/g})</u>% {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} for 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Immer wenn ein Feind durch einen {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}kritischen Treffer{/g} des {g|Encyclopedia:CareerHunterGlossary}Kopfgeldjägers{/g} oder seines Verbündeten getötet wird, erhält der Kopfgeldjäger für 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}Runden{/g} +<u>(2 × {g|Encyclopedia:DifficultyTier}Schwierigkeitsstufe{/g} des Feindes)</u> % {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Schaden{/g}.

languages.text: Chaque fois qu'un ennemi succombe à un {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}coup critique{/g} porté par le {g|Encyclopedia:CareerHunterGlossary}Chasseur de Primes{/g} ou un de ses alliés, le Chasseur de Primes bénéficie de +<u>(2 × {g|Encyclopedia:DifficultyTier}niveau de difficulté{/g} de l'ennemi)</u> % de {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}dégâts{/g} pendant 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g}.
languages.original_text: Whenever an enemy is killed by a {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hit{/g} scored by the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerHunterGlossary}Bounty Hunter{/g} or their ally, the Bounty Hunter gains +<u>(2 × enemy's {g|Encyclopedia:DifficultyTier}difficulty tier{/g})</u>% {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} for 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Lorsqu'un ennemi succombe à un {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}coup critique{/g} porté par le Chasseur ou un de ses alliés, le Chasseur bénéficie de +<u>(4 × {g|Encyclopedia:DifficultyTier}niveau de difficulté{/g} de l'ennemi)</u> % de dégâts pendant 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g}.

languages.text: 敵が{g|Encyclopedia:CareerHunterGlossary}バウンティハンター{/g}または味方による{g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}クリティカルヒット{/g}で倒された時、ハンターは2{g|Encyclopedia:Round}ラウンド{/g}の間、+<u>(2 × 敵の{g|Encyclopedia:DifficultyTier}脅威度{/g})</u>%の{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}を得る。
languages.original_text: Whenever an enemy is killed by a {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hit{/g} scored by the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerHunterGlossary}Bounty Hunter{/g} or their ally, the Bounty Hunter gains +<u>(2 × enemy's {g|Encyclopedia:DifficultyTier}difficulty tier{/g})</u>% {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} for 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g}.

traits.locale_text: 敵がハンターまたは味方による{g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}クリティカルヒット{/g}で倒された時、ハンターは2{g|Encyclopedia:Round}ラウンド{/g}の間、+<u>(4 × 敵の{g|Encyclopedia:DifficultyTier}脅威度{/g})</u>%を得る。
